item.title: Johnson to overrule scientists and ease lockdown
item.description: List of businesses allowed to reopen on July 4 extended as 2-metre distancing rule reduced
item.content:encoded: Boris Johnson will on Tuesday reject misgivings from some leading scientists and press ahead with a plan to cut...
item.ftc:byline: George Parker, Jim Pickard, Laura Hughes and Sebastian Payne in London
item.dc:creator: George Parker
Jim Pickard
Sebastian Payne
Laura Hughes
